Forensic Audit Services
======================
### Service Provider Background Information

The National Capital Region (NCR) is seeking a service provider to provide Forensic Audit Services. The objective is to support the Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) in anti-fraud efforts by conducting forensic audits.

### Solicitation Details

- **Solicitation Number**: 10212392
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005418
- **Publication Date**: August 26, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 07, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Number**: 5
- **Amendment Date**: October 5, 2022

### Background and Statements of Work

PCH is seeking the assistance of consulting firms with expertise in forensic audits to support its anti-fraud efforts. The service provider will perform a minimum of 1 to 2 forensic audits annually. The audit services will be based on the Statement of Work, as outlined in the attached document.

The RFP details are as follows:
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA),World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- **Service Category**: Professional Services (SRV)
- **Delivery Regions**: Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Notices**: Notice Available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub)
